newsitem.title: USA: Nobody Beats the Wiz exits Boston, Hartford.
newsitem.headline: Nobody Beats the Wiz exits Boston, Hartford.

text.p: Electronics superstore Nobody Beats the Wiz said Monday it is closing all three of its stores in Massachusetts and two in Connecticut.
Nobody Beats the Wiz, a privately held company based in Carteret, N.J., said in a statement that conditions were simply too competitive in the Boston and Hartford, Conn., markets.
The closings will eliminate some 300 full-time and part-time positions, or 7 percent of the company's workforce.
The stores to be closed in Massachusetts are in Saugus, Framingham and Holyoke. The Connecticut stores are in Newington and Meriden.
